reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Capacity building of Tunisian women MPs

description.narrative: The aim of the project is to empower Tunisian women MPs by increasing their skills and efficient presence in the Tunisian People?s Assembly. The project is also aimed at promoting bilateral Parliament cooperation between Finland and Tunisia. The project ac tivities consist of training sessions seminars and workshops on different thematics aimed at developing the skills and expertise of primarily newly elected women parliamentarians in the field of economics equality and Rule of Law. Moreover the communicatio n skills and networking among the MPs will be enhanced. The MPs will also have the opportunity to visit the Finnish Parliament. Length: 14.4.2015-15.12.2015 Budget: 30 000 euros
